pullRequest.title: Fix #6048 and fix inventory detection issues
pullRequest.bodyText:
Closes #6048
Closes #
Closes #
Changes proposed in this pull request:

Allows postbox to request enchanted books, potions and tipped arrows now
Fix some inventory detection issues by using a set
Use the more efficient building searching method

Review please

fix inventory issues at the core

nodes.bodyText:
This method is either named wrong, or does literally not what is written on the can.
Rename the method.
Also make this a parallel stream. With more then 1000+ entries in that list of items this should help.
